entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST THIS AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 60
